activities: Transaction specialists receiving financial information for auditing purposes.  Some information may include personally identifying data.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: online,offline, and manually processed organization and customer data
recoursemech: European Union Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAS) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).  Cost and Compliance Associates will attempt to resolve directly any concerns brought about Safe Harbor adherence.  When these concerns cannot be resolved, Cost & Compliance Associates will work directly with the EU DPAS for final resolution.
